short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Independent review/comment/ranking of everything! Never worry about being deleted/distorted/tampered/supervised!
short.es: Revisión / comentario / clasificación independiente de todo! ¡Ya no se preocupe por ser eliminado / distorsionado / manipulado /…
short.fr: Revue/commentaire/classement indépendant de tout ! Ne vous inquiétez plus d'être supprimé/déformé/falsifié/supervisé !
short.hi: सब कुछ की स्वतंत्र समीक्षा/टिप्पणी/रैंकिंग! अब हटाए जाने/विकृत/छेड़छाड़/पर्यवेक्षित होने के बारे में चिंता न करें!
short.ko: 독자리뷰/댓글/모든 것의 순위! 더 이상 삭제/왜곡/변조/감독 걱정하지 마세요!
short.ru: Независимый обзор / комментарий / рейтинг всего! Никогда больше не беспокойтесь об удалении / искажении / подделке / контроле!
short.vi: Đánh giá / nhận xét / xếp hạng độc lập về mọi thứ! Không bao giờ phải lo lắng về việc bị xóa / bóp méo / giả mạo / bị giám sát nữa!
short.zh_CN: 线上独立评价/评论/评分。不再担心被删除/扭曲/篡改！
short.zh_TW: 線上獨立評價/評論/評分。不再擔心被刪除/扭曲/篡改！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HiJury is an independent extension that everybody could review/comment/rank an homepage online. It is trustable. "True, Fair, Objective" is the principle of the platform. You could comment on a homepage which lacks the module of review/comment or can’t be reviewed/commented freely. You don’t need to worry about being deleted//distorted/tampered/supervised anymore! On the other hand, HiJury could help an independent business owners or content creaters get objective review/credit/reputation, because it can’t be modified/limited by the websites themselves.It’s much more trustable based on a set of algorithms. It could also help people speak out online freely. Install it now!
